get.summary: Get Vaults Accessible by Current User
get.description: Retrieves a list of vaults that are accessible by the current user.
Fetch the document vault attached to the current session.
Retrieves the user id of the current logged in user.

get.summary: Get Authentication Token for Current Session
get.description: Retrieves the authentication token for the current session.

post.description: Creates a new authentication token based on the authentication information.

get.description: Retrieves a list of capabilities supported by the server.
The server public key used to secure messages between the client and the server.
Retrieves the server status. If the M-Files server is unavailable the service responds with 503.
Retrieves the vaults that are on-line and available for the user on the server.
Retrieves information on all object classes.

parameters.name: objtype
parameters.description: Object type ID. Filters the returned classes by object type. Only classes belonging to the object type are returned.

parameters.name: bygroup
parameters.description: If true, returns the object classes in class groups.

get.description: Retrieves information on an object class.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma separated list of additional data sets to return. Currently only templates is supported which will will cause the response to include a list of available templates available to the class.

get.description: Retrieves the icon for a single class.
Retrieves information on real object types.
Retrieves information on an object type.
Retrieves a collection of object classes for the provided object type.

put.summary: Set the refresh status for an external object type
put.description: Sets the refresh status to either Full or Quick. A request body containing 1 would execute a quick refresh, but a body containing 2 would execute a full refresh. Note that this call simply initiates the refresh process, which could continue for several minutes depending on the data source and volume of content to synchronise.

get.description: Retrieves the object type icon.
Retrieves information on all property definitions.
Retrieves information on a single property definition.

get.summary: Get Property Definition Value List Items
get.description: Retrieves value list item information. Only valid for property definitions based on object types. Filters returned data as configured by the property definition.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Defaults to 500.

get.description: Retrieves information on all value lists.
Retrieves information on a single value list.
Retrieves collection of value list items for a single value list.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Defaults to 500.

parameters.name: filterItem
parameters.description: The filterItem querystring parameter can be used to filter a sub-value-list by parents. The value of the querystring parameter should be the ID of the parent value list followed by a colon followed by a comma-separated list of IDs to filter by.

parameters.name: conditionType
parameters.description: One of the following values: 1 means Equal to, 2 means Not equal to, 3 means Greater than and 4 means Less than.

post.description: Creates a new value list item in the value list.

get.description: Retrieves a single value list item information.
Retrieves the value list item title.

put.description: Changes the value list item title.

get.description: Retrieves information on all workflows.
Retrieves information on a single workflow.
Retrieves information on valid state transitions in the current workflow.

parameters.name: currentstate
parameters.description: null or state ID. Restricts the list of returned states to those that are available as valid states from the current state.

get.description: Retrieves information on all workflow states of the given workflow.

parameters.name: currentstate
parameters.description: null or state ID. Restricts the list of returned states to those that are available as valid states from the current state.

get.description: Retrieves information on the specific workflow state
Retrieves all the shared links created by the current user or (if the user is an admin) returns all shared links in the vault.

post.description: Creates a shared link for the file information provided.

get.description: Retrieves the (file) content of a given shared link. Note that authentication is not required to access this endpoint; provided the vault GUID and access token are valid and not expired, the endpoint will return the shared file content.

delete.description: Deletes an existing shared file link, causing it to become invalid.

get.summary: Get Collection of Objects in the Document Vault
get.description: Retrieves objects. The amount of returned objects is limited by the server, by default to 500 items.

get.summary: Get Collection of Objects Filtered by Object Type
get.description: Retrieves objects of the given type. The amount of returned objects is limited by the server.
Retrieves information of the given object.

get.summary: Get Files Belonging to an Object
get.description: Retrieves the object file information for all the files on an object.

get.summary: Get a Single File on an Object
get.description: Retrieves the object file infromation for the object file.

get.summary: Get the Contents of a Single File
get.description: Retrieves the object file contents.

parameters.name: mac
parameters.description: If true, appends a SHA-512 message authentication code at the end of the stream.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Defaulting to native if not provided. It can have following values: native, pdf and displaypdfonly.

get.summary: Get the File Name of an Object File
get.description: Retrieves the current object file name.

put.summary: Change the Name on the Object File
put.description: Sets the name on the object file.

get.summary: Get the Deleted Status of the Object
get.description: Retrieves the deleted status of the object.

put.summary: Set the Deleted Status of the Object
put.description: Sets the deleted status of the object.

get.summary: Get the Current Check Out Status of the Object
get.description: Retrieves the current check out status.

put.summary: Set the Check Out Status of the Object
put.description: Sets the check out status. This is allowed only when the object isn't checked out to someone else, that is when the check out status isn't CheckedOut.

get.summary: Get Objects Filtered by Object Version
get.description: Retrieves the object information.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: A list of additional fields to include in the ExtendedObjectVersion. Currently only properties is supported.

delete.description: Destroys the object version. As checked in versions cannot be destroyed this can only be performed on a checked out version and is equivalent to an undo checkout. Returns the new ObjectVersion information if it is still visible to the user.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true, DELETE will perform an undo checkout even if the object isnt checked out to the current user on this computer.

parameters.name: allVersions
parameters.description: If true, DELETE will destroy the whole object. Unlike normal DELETE, this will not require the object to be checked out.

post.description: Stores a temporary file on the server and assigns an ID for it.
